name: Still Alive Demo
detailed_description:
"Still Alive" is a sci-fi visual novel about Mirai Alloris who lives with her mother and sister in one of the inhabited sectors hidden from the radars of the enemy. One day some mechanical monsters attack their sector, they slaughter Mirai’s mother and her sister Aila is kidnapped. After the attack, Mirai finds herself in the human resistance movement's headquarters. She thinks that the members of the resistance who save her can also help save her sister, but it turns out that they have other plans. Thus she escapes and goes to City-5 where the enemy base is located, trying to find her sister. However, it is no easy task, as death waits around every corner there...



* Dark and brutal world of the future.
* Original atmospheric soundtrack.
* Fast paced narration.
* Exciting unpredictable story.
* Many choices with an unexpected outcome.
* A variety of battles with enemies.
* Unusual mechanics of character upgrade.

short_description: A horror visual novel set in the future of fallen humanity full of terror with a lot of techno-biotical monsters and deadly choices. The journey into the technological madness for the sake of mankind awaits. Will you survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP\Vista\7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Совместимая с DirectX® 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Совместимая с DirectX® 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

legal_notice: All rights reserved Graven Visual Novels, 2019.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains: Sexual scenes, Graphical Violance, Self harm.
